testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlTrafficNetworkInformationSubscription dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.4.1.1 [Need for Node Inventory] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Publish Node Inventory Information (NTRM 3.3.4.2.1.2}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N10R226_Publish_Node_Inventory_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N10R226_Publish_Node_Inventory_Information_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Subscribe to Node Inventory Information (NTRM 3.3.4.2.1.3}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N10R227_Subscribe_to_Node_Inventory_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N10R227_Subscribe_to_Node_Inventory_Information_Parameter}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Node Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.2.1.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R231_Restrictions___Node_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R231_Restrictions___Node_Inventory_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Name - Node Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.2.1.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R232_Roadway_Network_Name___Node_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R232_Roadway_Network_Name___Node_Inventory_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Name - Node Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.2.1.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R233_Node_Name___Node_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R233_Node_Name___Node_Inventory_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.2.1.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R234_Node_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R234_Node_Description_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator - Node Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.2.1.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R235_Route_Designator___Node_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R235_Route_Designator___Node_Inventory_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Direction is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.2.1.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R236_Node_Direction_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R236_Node_Direction_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference - Node Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.2.1.5.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R237_Linear_Reference___Node_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R237_Linear_Reference___Node_Inventory_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.2.1.5.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R238_Node_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R238_Node_Type_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Number of Links is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.2.1.5.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R239_Number_of_Links_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R239_Number_of_Links_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Inventory Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.2.1.5.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R240_Node_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R240_Node_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}
Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be received within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationsToReceive: ${PublicationsToReceive}
Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 18 CONFIGURE: Define the publication response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationResponseMessage: ${PublicationResponseMessage}
Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 20 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 21 CONFIGURE: Define the subscription message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionMessage: ${SubscriptionMessage}
Step 22 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 23 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}

Step 24 SUBSCRIPTION-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlTrafficNetworkInformationSubscription RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N10R227_Subscribe_to_Node_Inventory_Information_Parameter SUBSCRIPTIONMESSAGE = SubscriptionMessage SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 25 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 25.1 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note:If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 25.1.1 PUBLICATION-EC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlNodeInventoryUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N10R226_Publish_Node_Inventory_Information_Parameter PUBLICATIONSTORECEIVE = PublicationsToReceive PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 25.1.2 IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 25.1.2.1 VERIFY that a nodeInventoryMsg message was received.
Step 25.1.2.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item
Step 25.1.2.3 VERIFY that a network-id data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 25.1.2.4 VERIFY that a node-id data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 25.1.2.5 VERIFY that a node-location data frame exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 25.1.2.6 IF TMDD_N10R231_Restrictions___Node_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.1.2.6.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item
Step 25.1.2.7 IF TMDD_N10R232_Roadway_Network_Name___Node_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.1.2.7.1 VERIFY that a network-name data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 25.1.2.8 IF TMDD_N10R233_Node_Name___Node_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.1.2.8.1 VERIFY that a node-name data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 25.1.2.9 IF TMDD_N10R234_Node_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.1.2.9.1 VERIFY that a node-description data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 25.1.2.10 IF TMDD_N10R235_Route_Designator___Node_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.1.2.10.1 VERIFY that a node-route-designator data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 25.1.2.11 IF TMDD_N10R236_Node_Direction_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.1.2.11.1 VERIFY that a node-direction data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 25.1.2.12 IF TMDD_N10R237_Linear_Reference___Node_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.1.2.12.1 VERIFY that a linear-reference data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 25.1.2.12.2 VERIFY that a linear-reference-version data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 25.1.2.13 IF TMDD_N10R238_Node_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.1.2.13.1 VERIFY that a node-type data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 25.1.2.14 IF TMDD_N10R239_Number_of_Links_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.1.2.14.1 VERIFY that a node-links-number data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 25.1.2.15 IF TMDD_N10R240_Node_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 25.1.2.15.1 VERIFY that a last-update-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 25.1.2.16 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 25.1.2.17 CONFIGURE: Set CONTENTVERIFIED to True

Step 25.1.2.18 POSTCONDITION: PUBLICATION-EC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlNodeInventoryUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N10R226_Publish_Node_Inventory_Information_Parameter CONTENTVERIFIED = CONTENTVERIFIED PUBLICATIONRESPONSEMESSAGE = PublicationResponseMessage

Step 26 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 26.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 26.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 26.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 26.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 26.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 26.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to SubscriptionErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 26.7 IF TMDD_N10R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 26.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 27 EXIT
